content.name: Shipwreck
content.description: Shipwreck is essentially a scenario-based debate competition. It judges how convincing a contestant is.
rules: The participants are provided with a scenario where they are stuck on a sinking ship.
The captain of the ship can save only one among them.
The participants have to debate as to why they deserve to be saved.
Participants using any form of vulgar language or action will be disqualified.
